QuestData.Title: Croc-Out
QuestData.Description: The Stagalbog east of town is swarming with crocolisks. Swarming, you hear me? I've sold every bit of crocolisk you could imagine.$B$BCrocolisk hides, teeth, tails, tongues, eyes, you name it. My point is, they ain't sellin' anymore. There's too many crocs! We're over-supplied and under-demanded.$B$BSo since they're of no use to me, and they occasionally eat my guests, I need you to just kill the suckers. Do me the favor, eh? I'll be here negotiatin' things with your people.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't try to pull a fast one on me, pal. I know croc like nobody else.
QuestData.RewardText: All taken care of? Good to hear. Takes a load off my mind.$B$BNow I can focus on proper business for the fine folk of Marshtide and Stonard, weary from the war... and all that junk.
